location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the External Affairs Department (Government of India) and the Secretary of State for India regarding travel plans for Mr Moynihan.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
